text: Love Is News is a 1937 American comedy movie directed by Tay Garnett and starring Tyrone Power, Loretta Young, Don Ameche, George Sanders, Dudley Digges, Pauline Moore, Jane Darwell. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox and was remade in 1948 as That Wonderful Urge. ==Other websites== * Love Is News in the Internet Movie Database * * * Category:1937 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Tay Garnett
title: Love Is News
